remarks: Lemma for ~ mndodcong .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
mndodconglem.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
mndodconglem.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
mndodconglem.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( O ` A ) e. NN ) $.
mndodconglem.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
mndodconglem.5 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
mndodconglem.6 $e |- ( ph -> M < ( O ` A ) ) $.
mndodconglem.7 $e |- ( ph -> N < ( O ` A ) ) $.
mndodconglem.8 $e |- ( ph -> ( M .x. A ) = ( N .x. A ) ) $.
mndodconglem $p |- ( ( ph /\ M <_ N ) -> M = N ) $.
